mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sports_equipment (item_name, item_price, note) VALUES (#{itemName},#{itemPrice},#{note})

INSERT INTO sports_equipment_order (employee_orderer, branch_no, sports_equipment_no, quantity, total_price, employee_approver, order_status) VALUES (#{employeeOrderer},#{branchNo},#{sportsEquipmentNo},#{quantity},#{totalPrice},#{employeeApprover},#{orderStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT sports_equipment_no sportEquipmentNo, item_name itemName, item_price itemPrice, note, createdate, updatedate FROM sports_equipment

SELECT order_no orderNo, employee_orderer employeeOrderer, branch_no branchNo, sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, quantity, total_price totalPrice, createdate, updatedate, employee_approver employeeApprover, order_status orderStatus FROM sports_equipment_order
